Length.desc: The longest axis in the diameter

Width.desc: The shorter axis in diameter, if mound ellipsoid

Landuse_around_Mound.desc: Landuse around the mound. Choose the majority landuse.

Landuse_on_top_of_Mound.desc: Landuse on top of mound. Choose majority.

Condition.desc: What effect has the looting or other damage had on the archaeological potential of the mound, on scale 1 pristine - 5 extinct mound

Notes_on_Condition.desc: Take a detailed picture of any interesting phenomena on the mound (e.g. Robber's trenches or associated cultural material)

Associated_material.desc: Document material you found on the mound, use annotation and Detail photo (with scale) for additional info.

Associated_features.desc: Describe any standing features directly associated with the mound, such as a krepis, enclosure wall, later constructions, etc. List dimensions with each feature or document with images.
